event.title: Last year, his brother Caleb provided

data.event: Last year, his brother Caleb provided the pig.

event.title: kissed a piglet named Jethro on Friday afternoon

data.event: He kissed a piglet named Jethro on Friday afternoon at the LaBelle Theater in South Charleston.

event.title: the treatment of diabetes as the first source of insulin in 1921

data.event: The "Kiss A Pig" event honors the pig for its life-saving role in the treatment of diabetes as the first source of insulin in 1921.
